channel.title: Soulsplit removing items
channel.description:
Alright guys well i'am trying to rip some stuff out from the soulsplit source released not to long ago but whenever i try to remove an item from my item slot i get this error
Hey guys well i'am new to coding and needed some help with this...
Basicly when i remove an item from my item slots it disconnects me i'am using the soulsplit source released not to long ago.
Iam willing to pay 5m rsgp for help with this.
this is the run error i'am getting
[CODE][8/12/12 5:43 PM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [8/12/12 5:43 PM]: at server.model.items.ItemDefinition.get(ItemDefinition.java:79) [8/12/12 5:43 PM]: at server.model.items.container.ItemContainer.addItem(ItemContainer.java:28) [8/12/12 5:43 PM]: at server.model.items.ItemAssistant.addItem(ItemAssistant.java:230) [8/12/12 5:43 PM]: at server.model.items.ItemAssistant.removeItem(ItemAssistant.java:1234) [8/12/12 5:43 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.ItemOption1.processPacket(ItemOption1.java:23) [8/12/12 5:43 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(PacketHandler.java:144) [8/12/12 5:43 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Client.java:1190) [8/12/12 5:43 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.tickTask(PlayerHandler.java:283) [8/12/12 5:43 PM]: at server.GameEngine.run(GameEngine.java:52) [8/12/12 5:43 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/CODE]

item.title: Soulsplit removing items
item.dc:creator: @rooneyscape rooneyscape
item.description:
@rooneyscape wrote:

Alright guys well i’am trying to rip some stuff out from the soulsplit source released not to long ago but whenever i try to remove an item from my item slot i get this error

Hey guys well i’am new to coding and needed some help with this…

Basicly when i remove an item from my item slots it disconnects me i’am using the soulsplit source released not to long ago.

Iam willing to pay 5m rsgp for help with this.
